name: DieStruction
description:
Battle it out with a friend in this co-op game of tag as you jump over and around platforms with unique functions for tag supremacy! 

PLEASE NOTE!!! I only have a windows PC, so I have no idea if the mac or Linux versions work! I really hope they do, but keep in mind!

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022! I didn't have time for sound, music, etc. but I am quite fond of the game I did manage to make! I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:
Player 1: WASD + Space
Player 2: IJKL + Slash
These are to move and jump!
